dt-example.title: Force Panes to Show/Hide for Specified Columns
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example Demonstrates the `show` option for defining whether a column should show a searchPanes or not. Here we have set the first name Column to have a pane where it would not normally due to the variance, and have hidden the position column which would.
The default value of `show` is undefined so that as standard the searchPaness will be decided on variance.
